channel.title: Making skills and items premium only
channel.description:
Hey guys,
How can I go about making certain skills such as (fishing, cooking) and certain items like (Godswords) Premium only? I have the premium thing set-up, just need to know how to make those things Premium only.
Many Thanks!

item.title: Making skills and items premium only

item.description:

item.title: Making skills and items premium only
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Then change if(playerRights < 2) to if(donator OR playerIsMember < 1).

Read full topic

item.title: Making skills and items premium only
item.dc:creator: @Situations Situations
item.description:
@Situations wrote:

That’s for setting items for like Admins and Mods only.

Premium is “membership” of Runescape Private Servers. I want to know how to make certain things just for members.

Thanks

item.title: Making skills and items premium only
item.dc:creator: @Pkman411 Pkman411
item.description:
@Pkman411 wrote:

i dunno what ur talking about but i can make it sos only certain rights work take this for example…

[code]if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8144){
}

if(playerRights < 2) {
if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8144)) {
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon);
sendMessage(“You need to be Staff to ware this.”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
